lead_paragraph: Manchester United full back Matteo Darmian was taken to hospital after injuring his rib and chest during the 1-0 home defeat by Southampton in the Premier League on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: United Defender Darmian Taken to Hospital
headline.main: United Defender Darmian Taken to Hospital
